title: The Ultimate Guide to Portrait Lighting in Blender

media:group.media:title: The Ultimate Guide to Portrait Lighting in Blender
media:group.media:description:
In this Blender tutorial, you'll learn fundamentals of how to light a portrait. While we're using Blender, you can follow in any 3D software. 

If you want to learn Blender, check out our Blender courses!
Introduction to Blender for Beginners
https://flippednormals.com/downloads/introduction-to-blender-2-8/

Switching to Blender for Experienced Artists
https://flippednormals.com/downloads/switching-to-blender-for-experienced-artists/
